name: LittleRandomDungeon
description:
My first game, Little Random Dungeon is a mini-game, each run is  3/4 min.

Controls

Moving with Arrow Keys. Attack with WASD keys.

Credits

This game uses the following pre-made assets:

  • The tileset and traps here
  • All Enemy here
  • Music here

game made with Godot Engine 3.0.6
